posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up an Abbaticchio Blue Sleeves t206.  Would prefer PSA, but will take SGC, BVG, or raw.  I'm also open to working on a bit of a back run with him, too. Let me know!

Jimi

Oops.....I revived this post from 2 years ago before we had a T206 section.  I didn't realize it would do this.  Reposting in the T206 section in a second.  Thanks for noticing, Lee!

Jimi
